column3: Latest;Kompong Chhnang:  Provincial police forces detained 17 people in crackdown on cock fighting and gambling site in Kampong Chhnang City.------The crackdown was launched after receiving information that residents were secretly holding big money betting on fighting chickens. Along with the 17 people
column6: 13 mobile phones and motorbikes. The 17 drug addicts were sent to the court by the military police on November 3.------AREY NEWS
